backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control and providing product defaults plus order creation and retrieval logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base definitions with warm OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, manifest, icons, and script bootstrap.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and maskable icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with customer and admin layouts, navigation, context providers, and global UI elements.
Component showing install prompts or instructions for adding the PWA to a device's home screen.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Displays an access denied message with an alert and a button redirecting to home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Provides the admin panel layout, navigation, and dynamic page selection based on route.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Checks admin status and either shows children, a loader, or an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderMessag: Admin banner showing new-order alerts with actions to view or mark orders as seen using polling.
frontend/src/components/PaymentDetailsSe: Renders a card showing payment method, optional payee info, and transaction reference.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Defines frontend payment configuration, payee options, and helper functions for defaults and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToHomeScreen.ts: Handles PWA install prompt availability, iOS detection, and triggering the install flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrdersPolling: Fetches and refetches admin order data and computes the count of new orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query for products, orders, and order creation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrderDetailsPage: Displays detailed order info for admins, including payment, notes, and copyable pickup data, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Lists all orders for admins with sorting, last-seen tracking, and navigation to order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Provides admin interfaces for creating products, bulk uploading, and managing authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRatesPage.tsx: Allows admins to update individual or multiple product prices with authentication and refresh controls.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user's cart with latest product prices, missing-product alerts, and options to edit or clear the cart.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including cart validation, user profile prefill, payment instructions, and order creation for authenticated and guest users.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, business hours, and a brief description of the dairy brand.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage hero, product highlights, and navigation to products and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Fetches and displays order confirmation details, payment info, errors, and clipboard actions based on an order ID.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Allows admins to search and view detailed order information including payment and notes.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Loads and displays the product catalog with add‑to‑cart support and error handling including retries.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartContext.tsx: Manages cart state with add/update/remove, syncs to sessionStorage, and exposes totals via React context.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines the CartItemType interface with product name, price, and quantity.
frontend/src/utils/adminLastSeenOrders.t: Stores and retrieves admin last-seen order metadata and counts new orders based on timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/cartPricing.ts: Calculates cart totals using latest product prices and flags missing products.
frontend/src/utils/errorDisplay.ts: Normalizes various error types into safe display strings and formats them with optional prefixes.
frontend/src/utils/payment.ts: Validates payee info, builds Google Pay deep links, and formats structured payment notes.
frontend/src/utils/productUpload.ts: Parses product uploads from JSON or CSV, validates fields, and converts prices to BigInt.
frontend/src/utils/rapidoPickupNote.ts: Generates a formatted pickup note for Rapido containing order details and item list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters, including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for fixing product loading failures, including known issues, existing features, and a new backend fix request. Contains metadata like schema versions, project name, and clarification settings.
